Text: Great job skimmed through looks very good cheers

Don't know if your interested or not but your file won't play on wd media player and some other players i guess due to having header compression on when you are using mkvmerge. I had to remux it with compression set to "none" in extra options the file ended up being one meg bigger but now plays fine. Maybe u can set compression to "none" for next file you do.
